partners: Retail stores, suppliers, sports teams, athletes, e-commerce platforms
keyActivities: Design, manufacturing, and marketing of sportswear and equipment
keyResources: Design expertise, supply chain, manufacturing facilities, brand recognition, athlete endorsements
valueProposition: High-quality, innovative, and stylish sportswear and equipment for customers. Support athletic performance and a fashionable lifestyle
customerRelationships: Customer support, online and in-store assistance, loyalty programs, targeted marketing
channels: Nike retail stores, online store, authorized retailers, e-commerce platforms
customerSegments: Athletes, sports enthusiasts, fitness-conscious individuals, casual consumers
structure: Design, manufacturing, supply chain, marketing, retail, and e-commerce operations
revenueStreams: Sales of footwear, apparel, and sports equipment, licensing fees, royalties
problem: Lack of high-quality and stylish sportswear that enhances athletic performance
solution: Offer innovative, high-quality sportswear and equipment that cater to various sports and lifestyles
keyMetrics: Revenue growth, market share, customer satisfaction, brand value
uniqueSellingProposition: Strong brand recognition, innovative products, athlete endorsements, and collaborations
highLevelConcept: Empower athletes and individuals with sportswear and equipment that enhance performance and style
unfairAdvantage: Strong brand recognition, extensive product offerings, and global presence
earlyAdopters: Professional athletes, sports enthusiasts, and fitness-conscious individuals
mobileAdvantages: Nike mobile app for personalized shopping experiences, fitness tracking, and community engagement
camera: AR-based virtual try-on features in the Nike app
microphone: Voice search and assistance in the Nike app
appIntegrations: Integration with fitness and health apps, social media platforms
location: Physical store locator, event information, and personalized offers
attractUsers: Targeted marketing, collaborations, limited-edition product releases
offline: In-store shopping experiences, pop-up events, and collaborations
appSavings: Loyalty programs, exclusive offers, and personalized deals
inAppPayments: Secure in-app payments for seamless shopping experiences
peopleAndRoles: Designers, product managers, marketing teams, supply chain and manufacturing teams
commonGoals: Deliver high-quality and innovative sportswear and equipment to customers
personalGoals: Empower individuals to reach their athletic potential and embrace an active lifestyle
purpose: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete in the world
needsAndExpectations: Customers expect high-quality, stylish, and performance-enhancing products
rulesAndActivities: Focus on innovation, product design, athlete endorsements, and customer engagement
strengthsAndAssets: Strong brand recognition, global presence, product innovation, and athlete endorsements
weaknessesAndRisks: Intense competition, supply chain disruptions, changing consumer preferences
buyerPersona: Individuals seeking high-quality sportswear and equipment for athletic performance or casual wear
buyerGoals: Enhance athletic performance, embrace an active lifestyle, and showcase personal style
buyerInitiatives: Purchasing Nike products, engaging with the brand on social media, participating in Nike events and challenges
buyingProcess: Customers research and compare products online or in-store, make purchases through Nike stores, authorized retailers, or e-commerce platforms
buyTiming: Seasonal collections, new product launches, promotional events, and personal athletic or fitness goals
buyerThinking: Customers seek products that enhance their athletic performance, offer style and comfort, and align with their values
buyerChannels: Nike retail stores, online store, authorized retailers, e-commerce platforms, social media, and influencers
whyBuy: Strong brand recognition, innovative products, athlete endorsements, and a reputation for quality and style
buyerInfluencers: Professional athletes, celebrities, influencers, personal trainers, and coaches
buyerContent: Product reviews, athlete endorsements, social media content, and influencer partnerships
strengths: Strong brand recognition, innovative product offerings, athlete endorsements, and global presence
opportunities: Expansion into new markets, sustainable product offerings, increased personalization, and digital experiences
weaknesses: Intense competition, potential supply chain disruptions, reliance on global manufacturing
threats: Competing brands, changing consumer preferences, economic fluctuations, and potential regulatory changes
productsAndServices: Footwear, apparel, sports equipment, Nike+, Nike Training Club, collaborations
gainCreators: Enhanced athletic performance, style, and comfort, as well as a sense of belonging to a global community
painRelievers: Offering a wide range of products for various sports and lifestyles, addressing customer needs and preferences
gains: Improved athletic performance, increased confidence, and a sense of accomplishment
pains: Difficulty finding suitable sportswear and equipment, lack of style or comfort, and challenges in staying motivated
customerJobs: Achieving athletic goals, maintaining an active lifestyle, and expressing personal style through sportswear and equipment
